Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne eshimanyisio khubo-liloba [eliuma] liafwa khulilamusinjia mana khuchesemwo imele yabaliitsanga
Ne nikhukasiamwo emikunda chie tsitende nende tsizabibu ne nikhukasiamwo tsisebele
Kho balie khubiamo bie nende ake emikhono chiabu chilakholele tawe, koo shibakhupanga orio tawe
Oluyali nilwa Nyasaye waloonga eshisatsa	neshikhasi	bioosi khubimelanga mwiloba nende enywe abeene nende ebiabalamanyile tawe
Ne eshilo neshimanyisio shindi khubo, olwa khurusinjiamwo eshiteere nabo baba mushiilima
Ne eliuba lichendanga khushichelo shalio esho nisho eshichelo shia Nyasaye Owamaani Omumanyi muno
Ne Omwesi khwakukasilia ebichelo okhula okhukalukha shingala kwali shinga likhamari liumile
Eliuba shiniliula khumwesi nohomba eshilo okhubura eshitere nabo biosi bibotokhananga khutsinjila tsiabio
Ne ni eshimanyisio khubo mbu efwe khwachinga olwibulo lwabu musafina yetsula
Ne nikhwabalonjela okhurula khwifwani eyo ebiabarakanga
Ne nikhwenya nikhubayibisia ne abulaho ubakhoonya nohomba shibahabinwa tawe
Halali tsimbabaasi tsirulanga khwifwe nende omwikhoyo kwebise bititi
Ne nibaboolelwa mbu; “mwilinde nende khukali imbeli wenyu nende kali inyuma wenyu mwakhaba murio mwanyoola okhubeelwa tsimbabaasi.”
Ne ishimanyisio shiosi shiosi shia Nyasaye wabu Omulesi nishiboolela shibabukulangamwo oluchendo tawe
Ne nibaboolelwa mbu; “rusie khubilia bia Nyasaye wenyu abakabile ,abakhayi baboolelenga Abasuubili mbu; ‘‘koo khubalisie biala ba Nyasaye niyenya nabalisia? toto enywe muli mubukori bwabulafu.”
Ne baboolanga mbu; “kamukhulakanga kano kalirulila lina nimuli toto abahabwene.”
Shibalindanga halali oluyoka lulala butwsa lulibabukula nabo nibali mukhusolana
Mana shibalinyoola okhulaamila nohomba shibalikalukha khubandu babu tawe
